query:
SELECT 
  pta.id,
  p.name as patient_name,
  u.name as therapist_name,
  pta.therapyType
FROM patient_therapist_assignments pta
JOIN patients p ON pta.patientId = p.id
JOIN users u ON pta.therapistUserId = u.id
ORDER BY p.name, pta.therapyType;
